      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized(java.lang.String actionName)
        Checks is the identity is authorized to perform the action. If the identity is authorized to execute the accion return true, otherwise false. "actionName", can be a single name or a list of coma separated names. If actionName is a list of actions, fails when not authorized to one of the actions.
        Parameters:
        actionName -
        Returns:
        true if the identity is authorized

      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized(java.lang.String actionName,
                     java.lang.Object resource,
                     java.lang.String resourceName)
        Checks is the identity is authorized to perform the action on the indicated resource. If the identity is authorized to execute the accion return true, otherwise false. "actionName", can be a single name or a list of coma sepaated names.
        Parameters:
        actionName -
        resource -
        resourceName -
        Returns:
        true if the identity is authorized

      • canRead

        boolean canRead(java.lang.Object resource,
                java.lang.String resourceName)
        Checks if the identity has read access on the indicated resource. This method is a utility method for: {@link #isAuthorized(READ_AUTHORIZATION, resource, resourceName)
        Parameters:
        resource -
        resourceName -
        Returns:
        true if the identity has read access

      • canWrite

        boolean canWrite(java.lang.Object resource,

        Checks if the identity has read access on the indicated resource. This method is a utility method for: {@link #isAuthorized(WRITE_AUTHORIZATION, resource, resourceName)
        Parameters:

        resourceName -
        Returns:
